#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main(){
int n;;
cin>>n;
if(n%5==0){
  cout<<n/5<<endl;
  cout<<0<<endl;
  cout<<0<<endl;
  cout<<0<<endl;
}
else if(n%5==1){
  cout<<n/5<<endl;
  cout<<0<<endl;
  cout<<0<<endl;
  cout<<1<<endl;
}
else if(n%5==2){
  cout<<n/5<<endl;
  cout<<0<<endl;
  cout<<1<<endl;
  cout<<0<<endl;
}
else if(n%5==3){
 cout<<n/5<<endl;
  cout<<1<<endl;
  cout<<0<<endl;
  cout<<0<<endl; 
}
else if(n%5==4){
 cout<<n/5<<endl;
  cout<<1<<endl;
  cout<<0<<endl;
  cout<<1<<endl; 
}

}
